cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.hit points:
First Level: 8 + Constitution modifier
After First: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per Cleric
cleric.skill proficiencies:
Choose two from:
History
Insight
Medicine
Persuasion
Religion
cleric.equipment:
(a) a mace or (b) a warhammer (if proficient)
(a) scale mail, (b) leather armor, or (c) chain mail (if proficient)
(a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) any simple weapon
(a) a priest's pack or (b) an explorer's pack
A shield and a holy symbol
cleric.subclasses:
Ambition Domain (Amonkhet)
Arcana Domain
Death Domain
Forge Domain
Grave Domain
Knowledge Domain
Life Domain
Light Domain
Nature Domain
Order Domain
Protection Domain (UA)
Solidarity Domain (Amonkhet)
Strength Domain (Amonkhet)
Tempest Domain
Trickery Domain
Twilight Domain (UA)
Unity Domain (UA)
War Domain, Zeal Domain (Amonkhet)
cleric.features:
Spellcasting
Divine Domain
Channel Divinity
Destroy Undead
Divine Intervention
